import React from "react" import './newsItem.css' const NewsItem = (props) => { var replacementURL = "https://via.placeholder.com/400x300" document.getElementById("news-description").innerHTML = props.description return (

{props.title}

{props.source} {props.publishedAt}

{props.description}

Sentiment: {props.sentiment}

) } export default NewsItem
